text: Chung Sang-nam (born 1969) is a South Korean football manager and former footballer. He played for the Pohang Steelers, and represented South Korea at the 1996 Summer Olympics. In 2015, he was appointed as manager of FC Seoul U-15 team == References == == External links == * * Category:South Korean footballers Category:K League 1 players Category:Pohang Steelers players Category:Suwon Samsung Bluewings players Category:FC Seoul non-playing staff Category:Yonsei University alumni Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic footballers of South Korea Category:Association football forwards
title: Chung Sang-nam
